definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: And he knew not at all what was doing: for only Jonathan and David knew the matter.
sentences.chinese: 那僮僕卻不知道是什麼意思，只有約納堂和達味知道。

sentences.english: David son of Jesse had reigned over the whole of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 葉瑟的兒子達味統治了全以色列。

sentences.english: This concludes the prayers of David, son of Jesse.
sentences.chinese: 葉瑟之子達味的祈禱終。

sentences.english: Unto the end, in verses. A psalm of David.
sentences.chinese: 達味詩歌，交與樂官，和以絃樂。

sentences.english: So David the son of Isai reigned over all Israel.
sentences.chinese: 葉瑟的兒子達味統治了全以色列。

sentences.english: Unto the end, in verses, a psalm for David, for the octave.
sentences.chinese: 達味詩歌，交與樂官，和以絃樂，八度低音。

sentences.english: David by his mercy obtained the throne of an everlasting kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 達味因慈悲爲懷，才承受了永世的王位。

definition: lit. strung through and filled with evil (idiom); filled with extreme evil/replete with vice/guilty of monstrous crimes
slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
